website_summaries.verdict: Protects your baby and your crib with soft fleece on top and a waterproof backing over the wood.
pros: Backing keeps saliva from soaking through to wood
Fits front and back crib rails measuring up to 8 inches around
Soft padded 100% polyester fleece crib rail cover with padded middle and waterproof backing
Comes in a variety of colors
Free of PVC, lead, phthalates, and BPA
cons: Putting this crib rail in the dryer can damage the waterproof backing, so be sure to air dry

customer_reviews.title: Gray long and short crib rail covers NOT the same color gray!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered two of the covers for the long rails of my son's crib and a package of two side rail covers (sold separately, but by the same manufacturer) in the gray color. The grays didn't match! The two long rail covers (pictured on the left) are a noticeably lighter blue/gray. The short rail covers (pictured on the right) are the color gray I expected. I plan to re-order the long rail covers to see if it was somehow a fluke, but I'm not holding my breath. I may have to switch to another color entirely rather than stick with the mismatched gray covers. Very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: afoutsak

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit and great product!
customer_reviews.text: Great quality (nice fleece with solid material backing) - doesn't turn in circles while baby is pulling and biting at them - fits great (snug) - love the grey - easy to tie on and remove for washing (air dry only) - perfect for our crib!!
customer_reviews.author: Tammy

customer_reviews.title: he must like how the fleece feels on his teeth
customer_reviews.text: Our 1 year old has been teething a lot recently and started chewing on the crib rail. I researched a few different crib rail covers and decided on this one since it has a waterproof backing. The ties seem durable and are holding up well. I noticed my son chewing on it one morning, he must like how the fleece feels on his teeth! We have a Delta crib, and this fits perfectly along the front rail.
customer_reviews.author: Hanks MamaTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: Serves its purpose
customer_reviews.text: This product serves its purpose. Some reviewers said their children learned how to untie the straps so I just double knotted them and I haven't had a problem. I prefer this fabric cover to the plastic ones because I somt have to worry about chemicals/toxins. I've washed it once and it came out just as it arrived. For now my child only buys the front rails, but I'll purchase the side rails if needed.
customer_reviews.author: Scarlet

customer_reviews.title: Great investment
customer_reviews.text: So far this has been a very helpful product. The baby started chewing on the crib rail, and I felt bad that she was eating so much paint, and also that the crib was getting so much abuse. This is helping with both problems. Seems to wash well (not sure about long term use yet). Easy to tie on to the crib. Looks nice. The only downside s that my particular crib has a slat in the very middle instead of having a gap in the very middle where the crib rail tie would go, so the crib rail ended up about an inch off center. That is a trivial issue though. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Pat A.

customer_reviews.title: So I needed something and figured something soft would be a good idea! and its worked out really well
customer_reviews.text: I was unsure of how this would work especially with the ties hanging down. But it works wonders! My own baby teething beaver was chomping his way through the side rail of his crib and splinters were starting to happen. So I needed something and figured something soft would be a good idea! and its worked out really well. The product is easy to put on and extremely soft!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Paul

customer_reviews.title: Good product, make sure it will fit your crib rails
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product IF it will fit your crub rail. We purchased the side rail covers for all 3 sides. The two shorter pieces are perfect. the ties on the longer one are about 1/3 inch too short for us to affix to the crib properly becaus its a little bit bigger around the rail. Unfortunately i had already washed ours so i can't return it. Overall the product is good, just make sure it will fit your crib rail
customer_reviews.author: Kim Young

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for baby beaver
customer_reviews.text: This is one of those baby products nobody told me I would need! I had to find out the hard way when I went to get my baby from her crib and she had white paint chunks all over her face. She had beavered right on through her crib railing on her expensive Land of Nod crib! Logged into Amazon and bought this and it showed up two days later. Love it! An absolute must for a baby who chews! It's now prevented further damage and has hidden the damage she already caused.
customer_reviews.author: Miranda Wigner

customer_reviews.title: Stopped the problem, looks great, and adds a soft grip around the crib
customer_reviews.text: Child was waking up and just gnawing on the crib without crying or anything. We actually had to contact the crib maker to make sure the paint was non-toxic after walking in post nap to him having chips of paint covering his face. This solved the problem, looks great, and is a nice soft bumper now that he has gotten older and can stand at the edge.
customer_reviews.author: dljuly3

customer_reviews.title: A Must for all cribs!
customer_reviews.text: Great covers for your baby crib! If you have a baby that likes to chew, or even just to be on the safe side, these are a MUST. As soon as my kids are able to stand in their crib, these go on. I want my crib to last as long as possible, and if you have a crib that converts into toddler bed or even double bed, you want the wood looking nice! These fit narrow slotted cribs. There are other thicker/longer ones that will go on other cribs with wider front panels. My kids never have issues un-tying these, or them being able to pull off. They stay or tight.
customer_reviews.author: Amber Lee

customer_reviews.title: Perfect solution!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these to keep our granddaughter from biting the rails on her crib and they are the perfect solution! They are easy to put on, they fit tightly to the rails, and they look really nice on the crib! This particular brand had good reviews, and I see why - they appear to be of very good quality and look like they are going to last a long time. Truly, I don't know why anyone would not use them! Just remember when ordering you need one set (long) for the front rail and a separate set (two shorts) for the sides.
customer_reviews.author: EMG

customer_reviews.title: Best. Purchase. Ever.
customer_reviews.text: Would highly, highly recommend if you have a little beaver who likes to chew the wood/paint on their crib. We have had these for a few months and they are amazing. They are still in great condition and have protected our crib even though my son teethes on it whenever he is in the crib. They hold up great in the wash and dry quickly when you air-dry them. I was worried that they wouldn't fit my son's crib but they fit perfectly. Buy it! You won't be disappointed!!
customer_reviews.author: FrequentAmazonCustomer

customer_reviews.title: Did not fit my crib
customer_reviews.text: For some reason this did not fit the front rail of my crib. The side covers did, but not the front. I needed it ASAP thought so my daughter would stop chewing the wood on her crib, so I made ties to attach to the strings to make them longer. For awhile it worked, but now that she's older, she can move them out of the way to get back at the wood. I don't see any new marks so she must just be playing with it. The side ones have not even moved so I'm just disappointed in the front rail cover.
customer_reviews.author: kristin c.

customer_reviews.title: LIFE SAVER!
customer_reviews.text: I had already ordered this because my daughter loves to bite anything in plain sight. Sure enough one day before the package arrived she hurt her gums and bled for awhile. That accident still didn't stop her from biting the crib again! THIS RAIL COVER IS A LIFE SAVER. I was a bit worried she was maybe going to undo the ties since she has on her crib bumpers but nope. It has stayed on securely. I am so happy with this product!
customer_reviews.author: Mamabear

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality soft
customer_reviews.text: Just gonna copy what I put for the side rails we purchased as well: Really like these was really easy to tie on and they are very soft but with out it being furry (or my toddler would just try to chew off all of the fur) this has actually made her not even try to chew on the rails any more I figured she'd still try but not so much now with is nice I just wish I remembered these thing existed as soon as she could reach the top of crib so she didn't damage it. Oh well
customer_reviews.author: Teresa

customer_reviews.title: Expensive to cover all sides but worth the investment
customer_reviews.text: I wasn’t happy about the price. This is so way over priced but that this is the going $ everywhere, besides a second hand store. Very happy with my purchase otherwise. My little one was chipping away all he paint I couldn’t get these washed fast enough. I cleaned them as instructed... machine wash and hang to dry. I have a slim fit rail and it fits my daughters crib nicely. The sage green is very pretty, and this will keep her sleeping area safe as well as extending the life of this crib.
customer_reviews.author: Jessie.S

customer_reviews.title: Quality good, beware of fit depending on the crib
customer_reviews.text: The wrap is pretty good quality and fits snugly on the crib. The only problem I've had is that my crib has a wide slat in the center front and the wrap has a tie right in the center that I can't use (because it won't go THROUGH wood), so it has left the middle of the wrap loose on the crib. I have to rig it some other way to make it sit snugly on the crib now. If you have standard slats all around the crib, this will fit fine.
customer_reviews.author: Liz Marie

customer_reviews.title: Not recommended
customer_reviews.text: This rail cover did not live up to the price tag or the brand name. It was easy to put on the crib, but not very durable as one of the ribbons ripped off during tying it. I didn't find the material appropriate for crib or baby who is known to chew the rails, and so that was another reason to send it back. Not recommended.
customer_reviews.author: MM8

customer_reviews.title: Wish I had these for my first!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered two of these after my one year old chewed their crib rail to the point of bleeding (ugh). These arrived quickly, are easy to put on the crib, fit snug, and prevent any more damage (the the baby or crib...). Definitely recommend buying these. Also, it says not to, but I washed these in the washer and dryer and they came out beautifully.
customer_reviews.author: DeeDiane

customer_reviews.title: Forget any other crib rail protector, this is the best
customer_reviews.text: Oh yes for sure love this product. My kid started teething and with that, began chewing the paint and wooden rail of her crib (she is a human baby not a horse) so I was happy to find this product. No more paint chips stuck to her face after we tied this on. Even with my limited knowledge of knots this tied on easily and securely. I had previously tried a snap on clear vinyl rail protector and that was ridiculous and didn’t work. This does, unequivocally.
customer_reviews.author: ssstephanie

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than described
customer_reviews.text: I measured the circumference of my crib railing and it measured exactly 8". This was advertised to fit crib railing 8" or less around. This is TINY. I mean so small. I don't know what crib railing this would actually completely covered. I have it tied the tightest I could possibly tie it and still there is a good portion of wood showing, but I just turned the part that it covers towards the baby so it works ok for me. If you are looking for something that wraps around the whole railing and look good while on, I'd suggest ordering the longer version.
customer_reviews.author: Mama Cuppycakes

customer_reviews.title: It works great!
customer_reviews.text: There are some bad reviews so I was a little worried about the fit. It works great! The ties are not too short, it does not spin around if you tie it tight. My only complaints are that the picture looked like a faux suade, but this is more like a flannel, which isn't a problem, just not what i was expecting. Second, there are no cleaning instructions which is slightly upsetting because I dont want it to shrink.
customer_reviews.author: Sariah Branham

customer_reviews.title: Seems safe and effective.
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as I had hoped. Good quality and the waterproof backing is effective. My child continues to chew however now the crib rail is saved. She also prefers to chew this side, which means no more teeth marks on the back rail either. Easy to clean, I hang dry. I tuck the strings under the cover and all is fine. Have had this for several months now.
customer_reviews.author: MtMuchacha

customer_reviews.title: You need at least one of those
customer_reviews.text: At first my husband thought I spent money on this for nothing and didn't quite like it. But then our daughter had a tantrum in her crib and busted her frenulum on the crib railing. The cover thanks to it limited the damage but had to bring her to the ER to have her looked at. Anyway, I would recommend this and so will my husband after our experience. It's well made and offer a good padding and is machine washable.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy

customer_reviews.title: Not plastic or metal. Saves furniture. Less teeth marks. hooray!
customer_reviews.text: Stupid hard to put on, but if you love your furniture and your child and don't want them to eat your railings and ingesting who knows what china puts into crib finishes these days, do yourself a favor and get this handy little rail guard. It looks better than plastic ones and I am sure tastes a whole lot better for Jr too. Ok it's not THAT hard to install, especially if you like to tie pretty little bows and having lots of shoe tying experience helps as well. It comes off too which makes it great when they graduate to the next stage in life with ease and is machine washable.
customer_reviews.author: Ollie Tortuga

customer_reviews.title: Worth the Money
customer_reviews.text: Was a little hesitant with them having to be bought in 2 sets and making the cost double what other sets cost, but I really like the waterproof backing and the padded feel. Baby still chews on it and I’m no longer worried about damage to her mouth or crib.
customer_reviews.author: Shoomary

customer_reviews.title: This is made only for conventional cribs
customer_reviews.text: I have a crib with a bit larger, thicker railing and it is nearly impossible to safely tie this. This product could have been made better, instead you have two pieces one one end of the wrap that you have to bring to the other end, so for a thicker railing this doesn't work. I broke my fingers trying to tie it together as it's not long enough. Not sure if it will stay on. I also purchased this wrap for sides of the crib and they were long enough and had no issues with them. They look nice, soft and I am sure great product for conventional cribs
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Prince increased but a great product.
customer_reviews.text: We purchased these originally several years ago for our first son and just purchased these again for a backup set while the other set is in the laundry. They're great! Same color as our crib, easy to clean, put on and take off! My son still chews on the rail, but the pads have held up well and you can barely tell the spots he likes to rest his gums! Definitely a great purchase. NOTE: 3 years ago when we originally purchased these the price was quite a bit cheaper, but because of need I went ahead and bought these at the $20 price point but I am still very happy with them.
customer_reviews.author: mrsfenny

customer_reviews.title: Waterproof, soft, padded, secure and cute!
customer_reviews.text: My son just learned to stand and when he's sleepy and upset that he had to go in his crib he falls into the rails. Recently he busted his little lip and it hurt my heart. I found these perfect covers that are waterproof. They came so quickly and were simple to open and tie securely on the rail. Perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Tara

customer_reviews.title: LOVE!
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic! My baby was chewing on her crib when she was teething, and also hitting herself on the rails when she jumped up and down in her crib. These have been a lifesaver, and are super easy to put on, take off, and wash!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Kessler

customer_reviews.title: Great but vinyl isn't the safest
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic design. Fit well. Strings are just long enough to make a square knot. Toddler can chew all she wants and no marks! The reason I bumped it a star is because the waterproof backing is a smelly vinyl! Not safe for around babies' mouths and noses!! I didn't realize there was a backing until it came. I was disappointed. Why can't hey use PUL (the waterproof fabric used for modern cloth diapers)?
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer T.

customer_reviews.title: Ties too short, but works great
customer_reviews.text: Works great and doesn't look that strange. The ONLY thing that stinks is that I didn't read how long the ties are in the description before I made my purchase. We have one of the convertible cribs so the top of the crib is much wider than the ties accommodate. I wound up having to see extensions onto the ties in order to fit it to our crib. My one gripe would be, I would like if they had an option to purchase one with longer ties.
customer_reviews.author: OhOhHeyLa

customer_reviews.title: It fit well on my crib and does the job ...
customer_reviews.text: It fit well on my crib and does the job of protecting my daughter from chewing on the crib. BUT I'm giving it 2 stars because there are no instructions stating not to put it in the dryer!!!! I washed mine then put it in the dryer and the waterproof backing melted and got stuck to each other. It was a MESS and got all damaged. So frustrating.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love love love this crib wrap I never knew they ...
customer_reviews.text: I love love love this crib wrap I never knew they exsisted so when I came across this I had to buy it my first daughter ruined her crib by biting on the crib she left it with many teeth marks so when my second daughter and a NEW crib I knew I wanted something to prevent it from happening again and I have to say I love it it's a life saver to any mommy's or new mommy's I highly recommend this crib wrap super easy to wash and easy to put on I love it
customer_reviews.author: Rosario

customer_reviews.title: They are easy for me to remove and wash nicely
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what I needed! I also have two short ones that are on the side rails. My son chewed up parts of the crib before I got these - they protect from further crib damage and protect him from getting hurt on the already damaged parts. They are easy for me to remove and wash nicely.
customer_reviews.author: ramiller07

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: So happy with this purchase. Should have bought this sooner. It was easy to apply to my crib and fits like a glove. It's soft and protective and my child has already broke it in by chewing on it. This gives me a piece of mind that he isn't damaging his teeth or his bed.
customer_reviews.author: Hello_carissa

customer_reviews.title: Good for child beavers
customer_reviews.text: One day you may notice that your child's crib is covered in bite marks. On that day, you will panic and come to Amazon for crib rail covers -- the type of thing you swore was unessential and not worth wasting your money on. This is the crib cover you will buy, and you will be grateful for it. It is soft on the top for drool purposes, liquid-resistant on the bottom so that the drool doesn't make the wood underneath gross, and fits most standard front rails. One thing to note is that this is a single panel. You may need to buy 2 (plus side panels) if your kid is a full-on beaver like mine.
customer_reviews.author: T Will

customer_reviews.title: Love these rail coverings.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these more to help give more color to my child's nursery. I had way to much white and needed a pop of color and I feel these railings did just that. They are so soft and we're easy to put in place. I was nervous that the color wouldn't be the same as what is shown but thankfully it was! And I'm sure once my son is old enough to start chewing on everything in sight I'll be thankful I had these ready to protect his crib and teeth. TIP: Don't forget to buy the matching side rail coverings. This is just the front rail.
customer_reviews.author: Mona

customer_reviews.title: Wish I'd bought these sooner!
customer_reviews.text: My 16-month old has recently started chewing on my crib rails....I mean really chewing. I started looking into covers and found these. Ordered them based on the great reviews, and so far so good! There was no chemical smell as others have mentioned. The gray color fits perfectly into the theme in his room. The fleece is very soft, and the waterproof backing is there if needed. These tie on, but I just double-knotted the ties and haven't had a problem. He hasn't even messed with these since I put them on!
customer_reviews.author: mrsgonzalez13

customer_reviews.title: Crib Teething
customer_reviews.text: I was so impressed that these were easy to put together, and fit my Babyletto Hudson crib perfectly. My son has curbed his crib teething, and that makes these 100% worth the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Alexandra K.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install, works great
customer_reviews.text: Easy-peasy, just tie it on. I got the white color so I was a little worried about it getting dingy, but no issues. The baby velociraptor realized fairly quickly that she can no longer chew on the wood after this went on, so she gave up and hasn't tried to eat this too. Therefore it still looks as good as on day 1.
customer_reviews.author: Milena

customer_reviews.title: Great protection
customer_reviews.text: It really does keep the crib rail from teeth marks. Wished I would've gotten them before having baby no. 1 use it. As first time parents, we weren't ready. Baby no. 2 didn't get to leave her teeth marks.
customer_reviews.author: Helenbackwards

customer_reviews.title: Great to stop a crib chewer!
customer_reviews.text: We have a curved crib, so the typical plastic tube bumpers did not work...however this was perfect. It did get dirty relatively quickly because my son chewed the crib a lot, but it was easy to take off and wash and reattach with the ties.
customer_reviews.author: Sawyer_Strong16

customer_reviews.title: Great product, love the waterproof backing.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this a couple week ago and immediately washed them. They come out of the washer looking exactly like they did going in. The waterproof backing is great for my drool monster. It's nice and soft and very easy to install. Only complaint is that it isn't a perfect fit with my rails--I want to make sure the strings are around rails rather than between if at all possible to make it more secure when it is tied, and they are spaced out just a tiny bit too far to be tight on the top of the rail. One or two more would help solve the issue, but it's great and I'd definitely buy them again.
customer_reviews.author: Meg

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I needed. I got baby up one morning only to find paint chips around his mouth and paint missing from the inside of his crib! I promptly bought this rail guard and it does what it’s supposed to do:it protects the crib from damage and protects my baby from harm. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Anna L

customer_reviews.title: My little one loved munching on his crib rails
customer_reviews.text: My little one loved munching on his crib rails, but unfortunately momma didn't love seeing paint chips on his lips. These are VERY well made and I especially love the waterproof lining underneath the fleece layer. Have taken them off several times to wash and it's extremely easy and fast to put them back on with the ties.
customer_reviews.author: A.B.

customer_reviews.title: Too expensive for 1 rail cover
customer_reviews.text: I didn't read the full description this only comes with one rail cover not all three. Totally my fault, however I'm just not okay with 20 bucks for one rail cover.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Whaley Kutz

customer_reviews.title: Good Covers For Crib Rails
customer_reviews.text: I bought this rail cover because my daughter was starting to bite the rail. I had already purchased the covers for the ends and was very happy with the purchase and the product that I went ahead and got the cover for the long rail. The covers fit on the rail very snug and I feel that they are very secure. My daughter cannot untie the covers from the rail.
customer_reviews.author: Jdole

customer_reviews.title: I liked the quality of this product
customer_reviews.text: I liked the quality of this product. Soft and easy to install. I ordered both the white and natural color bc I wasn’t sure which would match. I will say they are very close in color. I ended up returning the products bc I found another brand that sold a shade of pink that coordinated with our nursery better. I was concerned the white and natural colors would stain or show dirt easily.
customer_reviews.author: MM

customer_reviews.title: Would definitely buy again
customer_reviews.text: Overall I really like it. It’s easy to put on and clean. Plus it looks great in the room. However, one of the straps broke off after the first wash so it’s not a perfect product. I would buy it again though
customer_reviews.author: Aimee B

customer_reviews.title: Must have for toddler
customer_reviews.text: We recently put this on our crib and it not only protects it from bite marks but actually seems to cam her down at night when she's standing and wanting to be picked up. She'll rest her head on the fleece and calm herself down much more now. It's easy to put on and clean. Plus it looks great. She still bites on it but the rail is protected and the fleece isn't ruined.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Addict

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: Saved my babies teeth and her crib! I didn't like the ties at the bottom so I tied them in a super tight knot and then tucked then under on the outer side of the crib. They haven't budged an inch. My baby did not like the fact that I took away her chew toy, but I love the fact she isn't peeling paint off with her teeth anymore! Or hitting her head against the crib. Bizarre baby. Haha. Ps This only goes on the long front rail so I bought the two short side rail ones as well.
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: Not actually a teddy bear
customer_reviews.text: Is your baby whacking their cute little night vision face against a crib rail? Or chewing it to pieces. Put this elongated cylindrical teddy bear to use!
customer_reviews.author: alex

customer_reviews.title: Good Product But Didn't Fit Our Crib
customer_reviews.text: Good product but unfortunately does not fit our crib due to our front rail area being very thick as opposed to a basic front rail; I was able to to make it work by use of some zip ties to effectively lengthen the straps needed to connect it to the crib. Overall, a good product and a good value but, if I could change one thing, I'd make the straps much longer to accommodate a wider variety of cribs.
customer_reviews.author: XDanteX

customer_reviews.title: Good option to keep your badger baby from chewing on the rails
customer_reviews.text: These are working really well in keeping my daughter from chewing the entire top of the crib! My only minor complaint is that they do tend to slide a bit when she grabs them- I'll tie them tightly but after a day or so they're already loosened. My daughter will fall back on her bottom sometimes when she tries to grab and they slip a bit, but it's not anything too concerning. Overall, they fit well and are very soft, so I'd say they do the trick.
customer_reviews.author: sambi

customer_reviews.title: Easy to put on. Comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t have much of a teething problem with my kids, but I didn’t want them to hurt their heads or faces on the edges of the crib. These were perfect and a good value!
customer_reviews.author: Scott Gilmore

customer_reviews.title: Great for protecting the crib, and the baby from eating the paint off of wood
customer_reviews.text: This fits my daughters crib rail perfectly. I have two already that go on the side rails of the crib. That are the same white color. This completely covers the long rail in the front of the crib. I had to buy these because my daughter teethes on the wood, and has chewed the paint off many times. This covers it perfectly and I feel safer knowing she is not eating harmful paint chips. Highly recommend to any parent!!!
customer_reviews.author: Miriah Samson

customer_reviews.title: Awesome for teething!
customer_reviews.text: LOVED THIS! I would definitely get this before they start biting and teething! Once our son figured out that he couldn't bite the rail anymore he completely stopped. I have a very strong 14 month old who could literally pull anything off of anything. These were very sturdy (I knotted them on the crib) and they have not even moved an inch! Love that they are lined on the inside so they dont get mushy and wet. Great product! I should have invented this!
customer_reviews.author: Jason snyder

customer_reviews.title: These bumpers do a great job of stopping that
customer_reviews.text: I already had two of these bumpers on the side rails, and I finally ordered the long one for the front crib rail. My son is teething and he likes to chew on the crib instead of napping. Since the crib is painted, he ends up with paint on his face. These bumpers do a great job of stopping that! They stay in place and hold up really well to everyday use. I throw them in the wash every time I wash his sheets.
customer_reviews.author: OMZ

customer_reviews.title: Bought The Wrong Size
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a convertible crib. it was a little small, but I could have made it work if the straps were longer. I returned this and bought the bigger version. It's works great and covers everything that needs to be covered. I think this one would have worked if my crib rail was a thinner style. If you're not sure about which one, go for the bigger one:
customer_reviews.author: Ainsley

customer_reviews.title: The fit is perfect. It’s soft and easy to put on
customer_reviews.text: The fit is perfect. It’s soft and easy to put on. Hasn’t been toddler tested yet, but I’ll update review if it doesn’t hold up. I was concerned it wouldn’t fit right as our crib rail slopes up slightly at the ends, but you can see in the pics it’s fine with the slope.
customer_reviews.author: Holly

customer_reviews.title: Unsafe for babies.
customer_reviews.text: These things are being sold but not safe for babies. Didnt know when purchased but now I use this for so nothing else. Stop selling products those are not safe.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not just for cribs!!!
customer_reviews.text: We moved our 2 1/2 yr old to a twin bed. We thought he'd gotten over biting the wood on beds. WRONG!!! I was horrified to see chew marks on his espresso colored bed!! So, I purchased the long protector and the two side protectors to keep his teeth off his nice new bed! They fit perfectly!! The ties seemed to have been updated. Another version of this protector had horrible little strings that breaks wrapped around enough to allow me to tie it down!!! Very nice product.
customer_reviews.author: Veronica Villegas

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: My son chewed his crib and this was the perfect solution! Soft but not bulky and did not ruin the furniture! Easy to put on and wash nice.
customer_reviews.author: MBuck819

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what we needed for our crib stander and rail chewer. Our child can pull the strings out after I tuck them in but hasn't untied them. They pretty soft in my opinion not rough on babies hands or teeth/gums at all.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. HS

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: These saved our crib from being chewed up by our baby! WE got them in gray to match our gray crib. They're very soft and have a waterproof liner against the crib so that water doesn't seep through.
customer_reviews.author: Emily Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Saves my crib from teeth marks!
customer_reviews.text: This rail cover has saved our crib from so many teeth marks. It's easy to attach, I double knotted the ties so I have no fear of my little one getting it off and it washes well. I gave it 4 stars not 5 because it didn't fit my crib pefectly, but it's pretty close. 2 of the ties lined up directly with a slat on the crib so I had to pull the tie to the side so aesthetically it isn't perfect, but it functions just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Molly R

customer_reviews.title: does it’s job and solves a problem
customer_reviews.text: these are great if you have a baby/toddler that chews on the crib rails when they are upset or any other time. our kid is no longer ingesting paint and destroying his crib! they don’t clean up super well in the washing machine though, and you can’t dry them. definitely need some scrubbing with a laundry brush before washing.
customer_reviews.author: master flash

customer_reviews.title: Saved our crib rails!
customer_reviews.text: The rail covers saved our crib! My little guy learned very quickly that chewing on the crib was "fun". They're great quality, soft, easy to install, and hold up to little teeth biting/drooling/pulling on them. If you're like us and need a rail cover for both long sides, make sure to order two. The short sides come with two in one package, but the long side only comes with one.
customer_reviews.author: Mai

customer_reviews.title: Perfect and exactly as described
customer_reviews.text: Total score. Solved our problem with our one year old chewing on the crib. Very high quality, would purchase again. For the reviews saying their baby untied it...I have no idea how, because even I could not get it untied to adjust it once I tied the knots very tight,
customer_reviews.author: CarolinaBlonde

customer_reviews.title: Fits Babyletto Hudson
customer_reviews.text: Fits our Babyletto Hudson crib perfectly. Keeps the kid from chewing on the rails. Subtle. Easy to remove and replace for washing. Washes well, don't throw it in the dryer. Yay! I bought two of these for the head/foot rails (only one per package), and two of the Long version for the side rails. Very happy with this product.
customer_reviews.author: frenchiemikele

customer_reviews.title: Very good product and very good quality. Easy to clean and install
customer_reviews.text: Very good product and very good quality. Easy to clean and install. For the newborn, my son likes to bite the crib rails. It prevent from damage both my son's teeth and crib. Recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Sam Lin

customer_reviews.title: Love this product!
customer_reviews.text: These fit my baby's bed just right and still goes with the decor of the room. We only single knot them and they still stay on very well, even when he plays with the strings before he goes to sleep or when he wakes up.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Holder

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: My baby started biting the railings of his crib, so I wrapped and tied receiving blankets around the rails until I could figure out what to do. I looked at several rail protectors but was not crazy about a plastic protector (it seemed like saliva would get trapped beneath the plastic and not dry - become dangerous/grow bacteria). When I opened the box after purchasing this, I was very happy with the quality, it's very durable yet very soft, easy to 'install' (very safe), easy to clean and looks beautiful.
customer_reviews.author: mommyof4

customer_reviews.title: Very soft.
customer_reviews.text: Super nice, and easy to put on. It has a water protection layer. I however missed the part where it's fleece, so it was more of a dusty navy blue than a deep navy blue. But that was a mistake on my part for not reading closer. It's very nice though and soft, and good for when baby gets to the point of teething.
customer_reviews.author: Olivia

customer_reviews.title: Easy to put on and take off for cleaning
customer_reviews.text: When our little one started standing in her crib and gnawing at the railings, we temporarily covered the railings with a towel. The Trend Lab fleece rail cover is a perfect fit for our Ikea crib. Easy to put on and take off for washing, it's also padded. The material is soft and doesn't shed and has withstanded some aggressive tearing.
customer_reviews.author: Jae Paik

customer_reviews.title: Sizing of Crib
customer_reviews.text: Pay attention to the sizing of your crib. I’m assuming my rail size is larger in width. This wouldn’t fit exactly right, wouldn’t completely wrap around. Kept falling off rail. If the rail was thinner it would work perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Why

customer_reviews.title: No more teething on the crib.
customer_reviews.text: My son began teething on his crib and I was very worried about the impact on his teeth, and the wood. I searched and searched for the right product, and ultimately I chose these rail covers based on the Amazon reviews. The crib rail covers are super soft and attractive. They are easy to get off and on, which is important as I've washed them several times. Despite the many washes the covers are holding up nicely. My son's crib is white and the covers match pretty well. I high recommend these rail covers.
customer_reviews.author: A. Hansford

customer_reviews.title: I ordered two of these and they have been a great buffer. I also like the way that it ...
customer_reviews.text: My LO was using her crib railing as a teether, which damaged her crib and even more troubling meant that she was getting a mouthful of paint. I ordered two of these and they have been a great buffer. I also like the way that it looks (since I like to keep her nursery pretty minimal.) I only wish it was a little cheaper to buy 2, since I'd imagine the majority of people want to cover both railings (or is my baby the only one who isn't partial to one side?)
customer_reviews.author: alee2012

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for our little one who wanted to keep biting and chew on crib rails. Also protects against hurting himself on the rail.
customer_reviews.author: RxMomZ

customer_reviews.title: Works great on a Mini Crib!
customer_reviews.text: I was a little worried ordering this because we have a mini crib. But it works perfect for us. The last tie on either side goes around the corner and it looks like that's the way it's supposed to be. We ended up buying a second one for the other side.
customer_reviews.author: Allison FTM FTWTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: Great for our mobile teething baby
customer_reviews.text: We realized our little one has been chewing on his crib (chipping off paint)and this worked perfect to protect his little teeth. Make sure to measure around the top rail to ensure the proper fit.
customer_reviews.author: PJ

customer_reviews.title: This is a great product! My teething son starting chewing into the ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product! My teething son starting chewing into the rail of his crib, so we wanted something to prevent him from doing so. He still slobbers all over this thing, but it totally protects him from getting at the paint or wood. It was super easy to attach to the crib and fit perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: T. Ortelle

customer_reviews.title: Gets the job done and looks good doing it!
customer_reviews.text: These were exactly what we needed for our daughters crib rail. She was gnawing it down to toothpicks and we really needed something durable yet attractive! I like how soft it is and it is not an eyesore which I really appreciate. It’s definitely doing its job!
customer_reviews.author: Courtney Bautista

customer_reviews.title: This product is perfect and it feels so soft
customer_reviews.text: I’m a first time mom and I wish I knew about this sooner before my 10 month old started leaving teeth marks on his crib. This product is perfect and it feels so soft. Every parents who want to get a crib should definitely get one of these!
customer_reviews.author: Lily

customer_reviews.title: Ilove
customer_reviews.text: Omg these are a Must buy,!!!! My son was biting the railings due to teething and these helped him stop. And if he bites on it its soft and doesnt hurt him or scraped the wood. They're amazing. I recommend to all moms.
customer_reviews.author: Mel

customer_reviews.title: Buy it!!
customer_reviews.text: We love them. Great for my toddler. Protects his teeth and gums and his crib. Super soft but tough enough to protect it all
customer_reviews.author: BP

customer_reviews.title: Love this crib rail cover
customer_reviews.text: Love this crib rail cover! We tried several others and we liked this one because it is simple cloth covers. It stays on with simple tie downs which not only work great but preserve the natural wood of our crib. Also I don't worry about our little one ingesting plastic, rubber, or glue. Best of all it was delivered right to our home. I wish we had tried this one first.
customer_reviews.author: Toby S.

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: Just got this and the side pieces in tonight and I am very pleased with my purchase. No longer will my twins be able to scrape and teethe on their cribs. I bought two complete sets, and it was well worth the money. I bought the natural color and there is no chemical smell, and they are very soft. EASY to install (maybe 10 minutes on two cribs for all 6 pieces) and they actually look halfway decent! Was nervous the side pieces weren't going to fit because the wood gets thicker, but they work. Worth your money and I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Erin

customer_reviews.title: Great material, fleece outside
customer_reviews.text: Great material, fleece outside, waterproof material inside so even if little one knaws and drools on it, the wood on the crib stays dry. Great product. I just had to tuck the straps under so they weren't sticking out for the baby to grab
customer_reviews.author: Erin

customer_reviews.title: Awesome to protect the crib with!
customer_reviews.text: I read a TON of reviews on crib teething rails before I bought this. The gummy ones that stick on the crib had alot of negative reviews and I didn't want to have to worry about it coming undone. So I went with this one. I am very pleased with it! I like it because my little one doesn't even seem to notice it, and I can take it off and wash it whenever I need to. It's done a great job protecting our crib from those little teeth! A tip- double knot the little ties to ensure your little one can't remove it.
customer_reviews.author: GrahamTakesTheHoneycomb

customer_reviews.title: Attractive and Safe Rail Wraps!
customer_reviews.text: These crib rail wraps work great! They are easy to put on the crib and very nice looking. I initially bought some silicone sections that squeezed onto the rails but our daughter quickly figured out how to pull them off and chew the crib rail underneath, or even chew a hole in the silicone protector itself. Needless to say, those were a total waste of money and I wish I had bought this fabric wrap first!
customer_reviews.author: Ultra 64

customer_reviews.title: Worth every cent
customer_reviews.text: Don't even look at any other kind. These are what you need. Just make sure you order the right size for your crib. There are few purchases where I have no regret at all, this is one of them. Borrow if you need to, don't wait like I did.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Super soft and padded with lining in the back side. It fits perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: Briana Kovash

customer_reviews.title: Great crib rail!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these for my 8 month old who is starting to teeth and pull up to standing and "cruise" -- these fit our Graco crib perfectly, were easy to attach, look nice since they match the white crib, and have a nice amount of cushion. A nice feature is that the back side is water-proof so no matter how much my child slobbers on them, it won't soak completely through and hurt the wood of the crib. They are also machine washable which is always a plus! I just let them air dry to prevent shrinking. A great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Crib saver!!!!
customer_reviews.text: My 11 month old started to chew all sides of his crib. When I went into his room in the morning he would have black paint speckles on his face from chewing. I decided to buy these rail covers to see if they would helped and I must say...it worked like magic. No more chewing. I have a full size grayco crib and although I thought they were on the small side when trying to wrap around, they did fit and work great.
customer_reviews.author: Tica

customer_reviews.title: Soft material
customer_reviews.text: Baby has been standing and gnawing on the crib rail so I was looking for a rail guard. This one is made of a super soft material with a nice waterproof layer on underneath.
customer_reviews.author: CDaisyF

customer_reviews.title: They look great with our white crib
customer_reviews.text: These were a lifesaver for us when my daughter started munching on the side of the crib. They look great with our white crib. She can't get any of the ties untied either, which I was worried about.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Product is just fine - might not fit perfectly though
customer_reviews.text: The reason I am giving it four starts is because if your crib rail is anything but straight it is very hard to tie around it. Mine has a minor swooping decorative wood piece that i would imagine a lot of cribs have as i had never even noticed it before. I got the ties around but they are stretched tight and will likely "undo" at times. The product itself is wonderful though. I am not sure if my oversight or lack of planning is a reason deduct a star but i guess it's for not being CLEAR about it's limitations on the description.
customer_reviews.author: K. Schweiss

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I was looking for!
customer_reviews.text: Love this product! We tried the strips first but they looked terrible after a short time and ended up coming off. The Trend Lab Fleece Rail Cover is perfect!! It looks nice, ties on securely and is super soft. I didn't notice any chemical smell at all and was concerned about that having read one of the other reviews but it was fine out of the package and we washed it before using anyway. This was exactly what we were looking for and it protects my little termite from gnawing on the rail!
customer_reviews.author: Marin Mama

product_meta.title: Trend Lab Waterproof CribWrap Rail Cover - for Narrow Long Crib Rails Made to Fit Rails up to 8" Around
product_meta.description:
Color:White| Size:Narrow Front Rail - 1 pc."Protect your baby and protect your crib! Trend Lab's CribWrap® Rail Cover for narrow rails is the perfect solution for protecting your crib and teething baby. With super soft white Sherpa fleece on the top, a light padding in the middle and a waterproof backing, you no longer have to worry about your baby ingesting wood or harmful toxins. Just wrap and tie on this simple solution to protect your crib rails from teeth marks and drool discoloration, and to preserve your crib investment for years to come. Long rail cover measures 51 in x 6 in with 6.5 inch ties. Also available in 2 piece set for side rails. Fits crib rails measuring up to 8 inches around.
CribWrap® Rail Covers are PVC, lead and phthalate free."

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
Protect your baby and protect your crib. Trend Lab's CribWrap rail cover for narrow rails is the perfect solution for protecting your crib and teething baby. With white super soft Sherpa fleece on the top, a light padding in the middle and a waterproof backing, you no longer have to worry about your baby ingesting wood or harmful toxins while also preserving your crib investment for use in years to come. Just wrap and tie on this simple solution. Long rail cover measures 51'' in length with 6.5'' ties. Also available in 2 piece set for side rails. This crib wrap This crib wrap fits rails that are up to 8'' around.
feature_bullets: front: 100% polyester; back: waterproof mattress pad fabric
Soft padded 100% polyester fleece crib rail cover with waterproof backing

Protect your teething baby from harmful toxins and guard your crib rails from teeth marks and drool discoloration. When laid flat, CribWrap measures 51” long by 6" wide. CribWrap fits most narrow front and back crib rails measuring up to 8” around.
Rail cover is made with soft fleece on top, a padded middle and waterproof back for ultimate protection; Simply wrap and tie this solution to protect your child and crib investment for years to come
Rail cover is free of PVC, lead, phthalate and BPA. Dimensions-13 x 7 x 4 inches

Includes one long rail cover for crib front or back. Coordinating set of two side rail covers is available for separate purchase to offer ultimate crib coverage. Wide versions of CribWrap rail covers are also available by Trend Lab

specifications.Care instructions: Machine wash cold with like colors; Gentle cycle; Do not bleach; Line dry; Do not tumble dry; Do not iron; Do not dry clean
